description:
I was really surprised to find out that Elliot is a bit on the wild side. He just looked too wholesome and conservative when he pulled up in his truck and walked out wearing a white t-shirt and jeans, with a "business man" haircut!
He's 33 years old and he thought it was hilarious when one of our guys called him a "hot daddy"... he'd never heard that before!
Elliot works a pretty physically demanding job, he loves to surf and he definitely comes across as someone who doesn't let the small stuff bother him. He was very comfortable and open about how he stays fit and what he likes sexually. And, he had no problem dropping his pants to show off his cock!
He says he's a grower and I agree! His dick got nice and thick once he started stroking it...
title: Elliot
